name: FNF (Mod) Foolhardy Retrospecter Remix But Better
name_original: FNF (Mod) Foolhardy Retrospecter Remix But Better
description:
Hello and welcome to the Zardy Retrospecter Remix.. but better! The mod is much harder to complete. I think this is what the makers of the original mod should've done!  Thanks for playing the mod!  How it was made:  So.. I didn't make anything except modify the chart and bf and gf look better in the dark, as to not stand out.  I put the reanimated zardy dark version and replaced zardy with that.  BAM!  

Note: Chart is much harder..
